title: How to Draw a Haunted House

steps.title: Draw two trapezoids of different orientations which overlap each other.
steps.content: Draw two trapezoids of different orientations which overlap each other. This will be the framework.

steps.title: Draw trapezoids above the trapezoids in step 1 to resemble the roofs.
steps.content: Draw trapezoids above the trapezoids in step 1 to resemble the roofs.

steps.title: Draw the features of the front of the house by using straight lines which with some lines having border lines.
steps.content: Draw the features of the front of the house by using straight lines which with some lines having border lines. Use simple polygon shapes.

steps.title: Draw the windows using irregular trapezoids with border lines.
steps.content: Draw the windows using irregular trapezoids with border lines.

steps.title: Draw the chimney using straight lines and also the dead trees using crooked and straight lines.
steps.content: Draw the chimney using straight lines and also the dead trees using crooked and straight lines.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.

steps.title: Color to your liking (use dark colors)!
steps.content: Color to your liking (use dark colors)!

steps.title: Draw an outline of the house.
steps.content: Draw an outline of the house. Make the structure appear to be bulging.

steps.title: Draw a horizontal line and a vertical line to create a roof and a partition.
steps.content: Draw a horizontal line and a vertical line to create a roof and a partition.

steps.title: Draw two chimneys.
steps.content: Draw two chimneys. One should be in front (erase horizontal line overlapping the chimney in step two) and one at the back of the pointy roof.

steps.title: Draw two windows on the lower roof.
steps.content: Draw two windows on the lower roof. Make the upper portion of the window curvy. Draw a circular window for the attic and draw rectangular windows on the lower part of the house. Remember to make the two windows in front larger. This will create an illusion that these windows are nearer to the viewer.

steps.title: Draw a triangular shape below the roof.
steps.content: Draw a triangular shape below the roof.

steps.title: Make the door slightly opened.
steps.content: Make the door slightly opened. This adds mystery to our drawing.

steps.title: Add details to the front of the house.
steps.content: Add details to the front of the house. A haunted house would not be complete without dead trees. Make the trees pointy and crooked.

steps.title: Add colors to the drawing.
steps.content: Add colors to the drawing. The windows could be colored white but coloring them yellow creates a spooky feel is perfect for a haunted house. Now the haunted house is complete. Boo!
